content: do you love texture as much as i do if yes then this is the perfect pattern for your new scarf soft pretty and with a lovely texture the feather stitch scarf is perfect to keep you warm and snug you can use any yarn and hook to make yours i used b&m s chunky yarn in a green tweed with a 6mm hook this pattern comes with written instructions and a step by step photo tutorial for the feather stitch and will enable you to create the perfect cosy scarf
